objective: Monitor PostgreSQL database performance to identify slow queries and optimization opportunities
steps: - Query PostgreSQL performance metrics including query execution times and resource usage
- Analyze slow query logs to identify queries exceeding performance thresholds
- Examine index usage patterns and identify unused or ineffective indexes
- Assess table scan ratios and identify tables requiring index optimization
- Calculate performance impact and implementation complexity for potential optimizations
- Generate specific optimization recommendations for each identified issue
- Compile findings into comprehensive database performance report
- Send performance alert via Slack for critical issues
guardrails: - Define performance thresholds: query time > 1s, execution count > 100/24h
- Include specific details for each issue: Query, Execution Time, Frequency, Index Suggestion, Performance Impact
- Focus on optimizations with moderate to high impact and low to medium complexity
